New Records: Zaccharie Risacher had a career night with 33 points and 7 rebounds
Risacher shot 11-18 from the field and 6-10 from deep
Key Match Events: Trae Young trolled the Knicks fans in attendance at State Farm Arena
Young rekindled his personal rivalry with the Knicks
Pre-Game Insights: The Hawks have a nice core to build on, especially if they decide to trade Trae Young after all
Young's market was cold, though that may always change during the season
Post-Match Reflections: Young expressed his confidence in the Hawks' ability to win against the Knicks
The Hawks are a team in transition, having traded Dejounte Murray to the Pelicans
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks led by five points with three minutes left but couldn't close the game
Karl-Anthony Towns scored 34 points on 23 shots in a game they gave away
